1 year laterÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

CaptainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s log, entry 14: Holy Mother of Kerbin, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been a while since my last log. Moho was the last one, and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re 5 days from Duna. Oh well.

So yeah, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re 5 days from Duna now and heading into an aerobrake. The stationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fuel tank will be arriving a few days after we do, so weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re gonna be stuck in orbit until they can dock the damn thing and refuel the lander. Our top priority is recovering Franklin, and only then will we head for the grand tour landing site.

Man, 2 landings on Duna? HowÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d I get so luckyÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ oh, wait. Bad ending to the third Venturer mission. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s how. Hmm.

I suggested moving Enterprise in to dock with the Spacedock and donating fuel, but looking at the schematics, thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no way we could dock the two together; our external fuel tanks will get in the way. We also suggested ferrying fuel around using our landers, but thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no way we could get enough fuel to the Duna lander in the time frame we have. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re just gonna have to wait for the new fuel tank.

CHAPTER 23: THE RED PLANET

CaptainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s log, entry 15: Duna. Awesome planet. In a matter of hours, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll finally be walking on the surface, too. I canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t wait. BillÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pretty excited by the thought of it all, too, and Matton, wellÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ geologists love rocks from other planets, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m saying.

Anyway, we got telemetry from the fuel tank intended for the station here just this morning.

It completed its aerobrake and is now on course for the Spacedock. It should be there within two hours, and once itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s docked, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be heading over in Lander Alpha. MattonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s gonna be stuck on the station for a bit while Bill and I sort out this whole Franklin business, but heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ok with it. He just told me to bring up the Volcas samples that were very abruptly left behind on the last Venturer mission.

A few hours laterÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

Matt: Ã¢â‚¬Å“Alright chaps, hereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s our fuel. Alan, is the docking port ready?Ã¢â‚¬Â
